headline: TheViewPoint rebrands to Upstream, Launches Direct Sales Automation Platform for CTV Publishers
summary: New product automates direct-sales process for maximum publisher efficiency, launches integrations with Disney, NBCU, Paramount, Tubi, and Warner Bros DiscoverySAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Infra.tv, a TV advertising technology company, today announced the rebranding of its subsidiary TheViewPoint as Upstream, marking a strategic shift from legacy SSP technology to innovative direct sales automation solutions for CTV publishers. headline: Unilever Taps Google's AI To Reinvent How We Shop Everyday Brands
summary: Unilever PLC (NYSE:UL) disclosed on Tuesday that it embarked on a transformative five-year partnership with Alphabet Inc.’s (NASDAQ:GOOG) Google Cloud. The deal aims to revolutionize consumer goods through advanced AI and data technologies. This collaboration intends to enhance Unilever’s brand portfolio, including well-known names like Dove and Vaseline, by leveraging Google Cloud’s AI capabilities to create a new model for consumer engagement. This strategic alliance will migrate Unilever’s da

headline: Dan Ives Says Apple's AI Alone Could Be Worth $1.5 Trillion — And Almost No One Is Pricing It In
summary: Apple Inc's (NASDAQ:AAPL) next trillion dollars of market value may not come from a new iPhone — it may come from Siri. Wedbush analyst Dan Ives believes Apple's AI monetization opportunity could add $75 to $100 per share to the stock over the next few years. That implies Apple's AI layer alone could be worth as much as $1.5 trillion in market value (given Apple currently has about 14.7 billion shares outstanding). That’s nearly half of the company's current valuation — and yet, the market is ba
